flawed_nl_solution:
Marianne is 20 - 8 = <<20-8=12>>12 years older than Bella.
Bella will turn 18 in 18 - 8 = <<18-8=10>>10 years.
So, Marianne will be 20 + 10 = <<20+10=20>>20 years old then.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 30, not 20. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
